reviews.review_msg:
extremely hard. always late for class.  very picky on quizzes, the only way you can pass the quizzes is if you bring a ruler and protractor to measure the strokes and lengths of the characters.   instructions on her excercises are very confusing and unclear.
 if you want a course that will pull down your GPA, then you must take jap with this teache
I agree with the other comments in that she has favourites.If you're not one of em, good luck.She doesn't really teach, classes are identical to a tape, take DisEd, at least there's no bias there.

I don't understand either. Why so many ppl complained Omae sensei. She's not that strict nor harsh. I took 3 JAPN classes with her and I learnt a great deal. It's been almost 10 years now and I still remember my Japanese. Sensei, arigatou!
